definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論枳實消痞方能改善危重病患者胃腸道障礙。

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality standard of different specifications of Frutus Aurantii Immaturus.
sentences.chinese: 目的對不同規格枳實藥材進行系統的質量研究。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the chemical constituents of Fructus Aurantii Immaturus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究枳實中的多甲氧基黃酮類化合物。

definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
